name: Thomas Tasler
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I am a working student as a full stack web developer. So I need to know the basics to do the daily JS magic. But I want to get deeper insights in JS Framworks, like react, oder other cool JS magic, but I am a nooby.
what_can_i_contribute: As I am a starter in JS, I can not contribute a lot this year. But I can ask silly questions, to force the pros giving creative and revealing answers!
